actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 96-152.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #198 (179-96).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 976 passed in lieu.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury for fiscal years 1980 and 1981.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #198 (179-96)) Authorizes appropriations of $22,375,000 for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury for fiscal year 1980.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury for fiscal years 1980 and 1981.
